title: UNBAN for my Stolen account
body: Hi guys, is it possible to unban my acc? I came back for a long time and I found that my acc is banned I think someone played on my acc and that´s the reason why I didn´t know that. I want to play again but a fresh start is not for me. My friends waiting for me all time but for my ban i can´t play. This wasn´t my fault and I wish there is a way to help me. Thanks RIOT for the fast answer. :)

replies.body: Account recoveries need to be done in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in order to protect your personal information, so be sure to reach out to them as soon as you can. It looks like this account might not have been banned from compromise, but rather some weird behavior that needed to be looked into. Be sure to hit them up in that ticket for more info about your account!

You won't get the answer you're looking for here, because that is personal information. If you need to know the reason why your account was locked or banned, you should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Depending on the reason and the evidence, you may or may not be able to recover it.
